name: E.G. Chess Free
description:
A complete 3D chess experience in HD. Swipe rotate and pinch to zoom to adjust the board to any viewing angle. Watch as your Queen moves in real time to its destination and obliterates the opposing piece. Play online with Game Center, Bluetooth or locally against your friends, family and other chess enthusiasts.

Features include:
- 3D board and pieces with the ability to rotate to any view
- Play against a computer opponent
- 2 player local mode
- Play online or over Bluetooth versus your friends
- iPad support
- Retina display support
- 4 different 3D environments
- Undo
- Multiplayer chat
- 2D button to lock the screen in 2D mode
- 2D piece set option for 2D mode
- 3D lock view button
- Optional auto rotate that saves each player's viewing angle and returns to it after each move (perfect for the iPad)
- Save and load previous games
- Load a saved game and play it with a friend via Bluetooth
- PGN export and load
- Varying computer opponent difficulty
- FICS (freechess.org) integration.
